mapper.select: SELECT id, tenant_code, tenant_name, status, expired_at, max_users, created_at, updated_at FROM tenant WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, tenant_code, tenant_name, status, expired_at, max_users, created_at, updated_at FROM tenant WHERE tenant_code = #{tenantCode}
SELECT id, tenant_code, tenant_name, status, expired_at, max_users, created_at, updated_at FROM tenant ORDER BY id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tenant (tenant_code, tenant_name, status, expired_at, max_users) VALUES (#{tenantCode}, #{tenantName}, #{status}, #{expiredAt}, #{maxUsers})
mapper.update: UPDATE tenant SET tenant_name = #{tenantName}, status = #{status}, expired_at = #{expiredAt}, max_users = #{maxUsers}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
